extra_copy.content:
Requires Enhanced Autopilot
$4,000 upgrade after delivery
Model 3 will pilot itself along freeways and automatically park at your destination.

This functionality is dependent upon extensive software validation and regulatory approval. It is not possible to know exactly when it will be available, as this is highly dependent on local regulatory approval, which may vary widely by jurisdiction.
In the future, tell Model 3 where to go and it will navigate with no driver intervention.

With Enhanced Autopilot your car will steer, accelerate and brake for you within almost any traffic lane! It will also automatically change lanes on most highways to overtake other cars or navigate to interchanges and exits. And with regular over-the-air software updates, youâ€™ll always have access to our most advanced features and functionality.

After delivery prices are subject to change. Enhanced Autopilot includes additional driver assistance features. Every driver is responsible for remaining alert and active when using Autopilot, and must be prepared to take action at any time.

$CC01.name: Five Seat Interior
$CC01.description: Comfortably seat five adults in two rows. Second row seats can fold flat when not in use, creating extra interior cargo space.

$CC02.name: Six Seat Interior
$CC02.description:
Passenger capacity and spaciousness are balanced by open access between the second and third row. Third row seats fold flat and flush when not in use creating extra cargo space.

Rear air conditioning and heating system included.

$CC04.name: Seven Seat Interior
$CC04.description:
Maximize passenger and cargo capacity with seating for seven adults. Second and third row seats can fold flat when not in use, creating extra interior cargo space.

Rear air conditioning and heating system included.

$CC12.name: Six Seat Interior with Center Console
$CC12.long_name: Six Seat Interior with Center Console
$CC12.description:
Add a color matched center console for second row passengers, providing two additional cup holders and a storage cubby under the armrest. The center console is not removable and requires factory installation.

Rear air conditioning and heating system included.
